segments.source_content: # Release process

translations.zh-hant: # 發布流程

segments.source_content: Let's see how Docusaurus handles **versioning, releases and breaking changes**.

translations.zh-hant: 讓我們來了解 Docusaurus 如何處理**版本控制、發布與重大變更**。

segments.source_content:
:::info

This topic is particularly important for highly customized sites that may have difficulties to upgrade.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

此主題對於高度客製化的網站尤其重要，因為它們在升級時可能會遇到困難。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Semantic versioning {#semantic-versioning}

translations.zh-hant: ## 語意化版本控制 {#semantic-versioning}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus versioning is based on the `major.minor.patch` scheme and respects [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 的版本控制基於 `major.minor.patch` 模式，並遵循[語意化版本控制](https://semver.org/)。

segments.source_content: Respecting Semantic Versioning is important for multiple reasons:

translations.zh-hant: 遵循語意化版本控制有多重重要性：

segments.source_content:
- It **guarantees simple minor version upgrades**, as long as you only use the [public API](/community/release-process#public-api-surface)
- It follows front-end ecosystem conventions
- A new major version is an opportunity to thoroughly document breaking changes
- A new major/minor version is an opportunity to communicate new features through a blog post

translations.zh-hant:
- 只要您僅使用[公開 API](/community/release-process#public-api-surface)，它**保證次要版本升級的簡易性**
- 它遵循前端生態系的慣例
- 新的主要版本是徹底記錄重大變更的契機
- 新的主要/次要版本是透過部落格文章傳達新功能的機會

segments.source_content: ### Major versions {#major-versions}

translations.zh-hant: ### 主要版本 {#major-versions}

segments.source_content: The `major` version number is incremented on **every breaking change**.

translations.zh-hant: `major` 版本號碼會在**每次重大變更**時遞增。

segments.source_content: Whenever a new major version is released, we publish:

translations.zh-hant: 每當發布新的主要版本時，我們會發布：

segments.source_content:
- a blog post with feature highlights, major bug fixes, **breaking changes, and upgrade instructions**.
- an exhaustive changelog entry

translations.zh-hant:
- 一篇部落格文章，包含功能亮點、主要錯誤修正、**重大變更與升級指南**
- 一份詳盡的變更日誌條目

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Read our [public API surface](#public-api-surface) section to clearly understand what we consider as a breaking change.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

閱讀我們的[公開 API 範圍](#public-api-surface)章節，以清楚了解我們視為重大變更的內容。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Minor versions {#minor-versions}

translations.zh-hant: ### 次要版本 {#minor-versions}

segments.source_content: The `minor` version number is incremented on every significant retro-compatible change.

translations.zh-hant: `minor` 版本號碼會在每次重要的向後相容變更時遞增。

segments.source_content: Whenever a new minor version is released, we publish:

translations.zh-hant: 每當發布新的次要版本時，我們會發布：

segments.source_content:
- a blog post with a list of feature highlights and major bug fixes
- an exhaustive changelog entry

translations.zh-hant:
- 一篇部落格文章，列出功能亮點與主要錯誤修正
- 一份詳盡的變更日誌條目

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you only use our [public API surface](#public-api-surface), you should be able to upgrade in no time!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

只要您僅使用我們的[公開 API 範圍](#public-api-surface)，您應該能夠快速完成升級！

:::

segments.source_content: ### Patch versions {#patch-versions}

translations.zh-hant: ### 修補版本 {#patch-versions}

segments.source_content: The `patch` version number is incremented on bugfixes releases.

translations.zh-hant: `patch` 版本號碼會在錯誤修正發布時遞增。

segments.source_content: Whenever a new patch version is released, we publish:

translations.zh-hant: 每當發布新的修補版本時，我們會發布：

segments.source_content: - an exhaustive changelog entry

translations.zh-hant: - 一份詳盡的變更日誌條目

segments.source_content: ## Versions {#versions}

translations.zh-hant: ## 版本 {#versions}
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3adc0ceb

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus team uses a simple development process and only works on a single major version and a single Git branch at a same time:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 團隊採用簡單的開發流程，同一時間僅專注於單一主要版本與單一 Git 分支：

segments.source_content: - **Docusaurus {CurrentMajorVersionNumber}**: the **stable** version, on the <MainBranchLink/> branch.

translations.zh-hant: - **Docusaurus {CurrentMajorVersionNumber}**：**穩定**版本，位於 <MainBranchLink/> 分支。

segments.source_content:
:::note[How we will ship the next version]

Once we are ready ship **Docusaurus {CurrentMajorVersionNumber + 1}**, we will:

- create a <StableMajorBranchLink/> branch
- merge breaking changes on the <MainBranchLink/> branch
- release that new version directly from the <MainBranchLink/> branch

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note[我們如何發布下一個版本]

當我們準備好發布 **Docusaurus {CurrentMajorVersionNumber + 1}** 時，我們將：

- 建立 <StableMajorBranchLink/> 分支
- 將重大變更合併至 <MainBranchLink/> 分支
- 直接從 <MainBranchLink/> 分支發布該新版本

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Security fixes policy]

After a new stable version has been released, the former stable version will continue to receive support for **major security issues** for **3 months**.

In practice, we will backport security fixes to the <StableMajorBranchLink/> branch. Otherwise, all features will be frozen and non-critical bugs will not be fixed.

It is recommended to upgrade within that time frame to the new stable version.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning[安全性修正政策]

新的穩定版本發布後，前一個穩定版本將繼續獲得**重大安全性問題**的支援，為期**3個月**。

實際上，我們會將安全性修正回溯至 <StableMajorBranchLink/> 分支。除此之外，所有功能將被凍結，非關鍵性錯誤將不會被修正。

建議您在此時間範圍內升級至新的穩定版本。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Public API surface {#public-api-surface}

translations.zh-hant: ## 公開 API 範圍 {#public-api-surface}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus commits to respecting Semantic Versioning. This means that whenever changes occur in Docusaurus public APIs and break backward compatibility, we will increment the `major` version number.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 承諾遵循語意化版本控制。這意味著每當 Docusaurus 公開 API 發生變更並破壞向後相容性時，我們將遞增 `major` 版本號碼。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Docusaurus guarantees public API retro-compatibility across `minor` versions. Unless you use internal APIs, `minor` version upgrades should be easy.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

Docusaurus 保證公開 API 在 `minor` 版本間的向後相容性。除非您使用內部 API，否則 `minor` 版本升級應該相當容易。

:::

segments.source_content: We will outline what accounts as the public API surface.

translations.zh-hant: 我們將概述哪些內容屬於公開 API 範圍。

segments.source_content: ### Core public API {#core-public-api}

translations.zh-hant: ### 核心公開 API {#core-public-api}

segments.source_content: ✅ Our public API includes:

translations.zh-hant: ✅ 我們的公開 API 包含：

segments.source_content:
- Docusaurus config
- Docusaurus client APIs
- Docusaurus CLI
- Preset options
- Plugin options
- Plugin lifecycle APIs
- Theme config
- Core plugins route component props
- `@docusaurus/types` TypeScript types
  - We still retain the freedom to make types stricter (which may break type-checking).

translations.zh-hant:
- Docusaurus 設定檔
- Docusaurus 客戶端 API
- Docusaurus CLI 工具
- 預設選項
- 插件選項
- 插件生命週期 API
- 主題設定
- 核心插件路由元件屬性
- `@docusaurus/types` TypeScript 型別
  - 我們仍保留強化型別限制的權利（這可能導致型別檢查失敗）。

segments.source_content: ❌ Our public API **excludes**:

translations.zh-hant: ❌ 我們的公開 API **不包含**：

segments.source_content:
- Docusaurus config `future`
- All features prefixed by `experimental_` or `unstable_`
- All features prefixed by `v<MajorVersion>_` (`v6_` `v7_`, etc.)

translations.zh-hant:
- Docusaurus 設定檔中的 `future` 欄位
- 所有以 `experimental_` 或 `unstable_` 為前綴的功能
- 所有以 `v<主版本號>_` 為前綴的功能（如 `v6_`、`v7_` 等）

segments.source_content:
:::tip

For non-theme APIs, any documented API is considered public (and will be stable); any undocumented API is considered internal.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

對於非主題 API，任何文件記載的 API 都視為公開（且會保持穩定）；任何未記載的 API 都視為內部 API。

:::

segments.source_content: An API being "stable" means if you increment the patch or minor version of your Docusaurus installation without any other change, running `docusaurus start` or `docusaurus build` should not throw an error.

translations.zh-hant: API 的「穩定」意味著：當您僅升級 Docusaurus 的修訂版或次版本號，且未進行其他變更時，執行 `docusaurus start` 或 `docusaurus build` 不應拋出錯誤。

segments.source_content: ### Theming public API {#theming-public-api}

translations.zh-hant: ### 主題公開 API {#theming-public-api}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has a very flexible theming system:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 擁有極具彈性的主題系統：

segments.source_content:
- You can use custom CSS
- You can [swizzle](/docs/swizzling) any React theme component

translations.zh-hant:
- 可使用自訂 CSS
- 可[替換](/docs/swizzling)任何 React 主題元件

segments.source_content: This system also implicitly creates a very large API surface. To be able to move fast and improve Docusaurus, we can't guarantee retro-compatibility.

translations.zh-hant: 此系統也隱含創造了極大的 API 介面。為了能快速演進並改進 Docusaurus，我們無法保證向後相容性。

segments.source_content: ✅ Our public theming API includes:

translations.zh-hant: ✅ 我們的主題公開 API 包含：

segments.source_content:
- [Theme class names](/docs/styling-layout#theme-class-names)
- [Infima](/docs/styling-layout#styling-your-site-with-infima) class names and CSS variables
- React components that are [safe to swizzle](/docs/swizzling#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)
- The theme user experience
- Browser support

translations.zh-hant:
- [主題類別名稱](/docs/styling-layout#theme-class-names)
- [Infima](/docs/styling-layout#styling-your-site-with-infima) 類別名稱與 CSS 變數
- [可安全替換](/docs/swizzling#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)的 React 元件
- 主題使用者體驗
- 瀏覽器支援範圍

segments.source_content:
:::tip

You may not be able to achieve your site customization through this public API.

In this case, please [report your customization use case](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468) and we will figure out how to expand our public API.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

您可能無法透過此公開 API 實現所有網站客製化需求。

若遇此情況，請[回報您的客製化用例](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468)，我們將研議如何擴展公開 API。

:::

segments.source_content: ❌ Our public theming API **excludes**:

translations.zh-hant: ❌ 我們的主題公開 API **不包含**：

segments.source_content:
- The DOM structure
- CSS module class names with a hash suffix (usually targeted with `[class*='myClassName']` selectors)
- React components that are [unsafe or forbidden to swizzle](/docs/swizzling#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)
- React components that import from `@docusaurus/theme-common/internal`
- The exact visual appearance of the theme

translations.zh-hant:
- DOM 結構
- 帶有雜湊後綴的 CSS 模組類別名稱（通常透過 `[class*='myClassName']` 選擇器定位）
- [不安全或禁止替換](/docs/swizzling#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)的 React 元件
- 從 `@docusaurus/theme-common/internal` 導入的 React 元件
- 主題的精確視覺呈現

segments.source_content:
:::note

When [swizzling](/docs/swizzling) safe components, you might encounter components that import undocumented APIs from `@docusaurus/theme-common` (without the `/internal` subpath).

We still maintain retro-compatibility on those APIs (hence they are marked as "safe"), but we don't encourage a direct usage.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

當[替換](/docs/swizzling)安全元件時，您可能會遇到從 `@docusaurus/theme-common`（不含 `/internal` 子路徑）導入未記載 API 的元件。

我們仍會維持這些 API 的向後相容性（因此標記為「安全」），但不鼓勵直接使用。

:::
